topic.title: Installing the Open AI API Key

body.p:
To connect to the Open AI platform, follow these instructions to obtain an API Key:
Log in at .
Click on your organization avatar, then choose View API Keys.
Click + Create a new secret key.
Copy the key to the clipboard.
Paste the key into the API Key text field in the Oxygen Smart Autocomplete preferences page.

You can check that the add-on is connected to Open AI by checking the Model combo box. If it contains a list of model names, the connection was successful. The default selected model is gpt-3.5-turbo.
